content:
```
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(x)
Consists of steam engine(position x), boiler(position y) and offshore pump (position z)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
-  Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
-  Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Iron Plate Production at x=-15 y=-50
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position x=-15.0, y=-50.0
- Stone furnace at position x=-13.0, y=-50.0
- Wooden chest at position x=-14.5, y=-48.5

### Iron Plate Smelting at x=6 y=-60
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at x=6.0, y=-60.0
- Stone furnace at x=8.0, y=-60.0

### Coal mine at position x=37.0, y=-85.0
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position x=37.0, y=-85.0
- Wooden Chest at position x=38.5, y=-84.5
- Burner Inserter at position x=38.5, y=-85.5
- Burner Inserter at position x=38.5, y=-83.5
- Burner Inserter at position x=37.5, y=-86.5
- Burner Inserter at position x=36.5, y=-82.5
- BeltGroup at position x=37.5, y=-83.5

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when connecting entities with belts
- Ensure there is a valid path between the entities you are trying to connect with belts.
### Errors when placing an inserter
- Ensure that you are not placing an inserter on top of another entity.
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure that the chest you are trying to extract from contains the item you are trying to extract.

NAMESPACE
No information available.
```
